_header: Jesu that diedest upon the tree / And tholedest death for me
Subjects: Christ, wounds of; prayers, by Christ and His Passion
_description: An Orison of the Five Wounds — eight 6-line stanzas

BodEngPoeta1.First Lines:
Ihesu þat diȝedest vppon þe treAnd þoledest
                    deþ for loue of me…
BodEngPoeta1.Last Lines:
…Þat wiþ outen ende schal lesteAnd seo þi
                    louely face. AMEN Pater

EDU114.Transcription:
…God shild þat day my soul fro care[ ] yt shal fro my body
                    fareAnd haue mercy on meAs wise y leue & wil &
                    wot…

Borland,  Katherine R. 
             A Descriptive Catalogue of the Western Medieval Manuscripts in
                Edinburgh University Library
